roleset.name: give, to give

example.name: passive
example.text: The drug will be given treatment investigational new drugstatus, [a label]-1 accorded [*trace*-1]to drugs believed effective but lackingformal approval.
example.arg: to drugs believed effective but lacking formal approval.

example.name: active
example.text: Several of the city's black leaders, including Democratic mayoralnominee David Dinkins, have spoken out for racial gerrymandering [*0][*T*-1]to accord blacks and Hispanics ``the fullest opportunity forrepresentation.''

example.name: Args 1 & 2
example.text: No nation disputed the accordance to Canada of rights of access.

example.name: Args 1 & 2 again
example.text: The accordance of a fair trial to each citizen is a principle of the Constitution.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: He wanted to challenge their accordance of legitimacy to the political system.

roleset.name: agree, accordance
roleset.note: ACCORDANCE-N NOTES: Roleset based on OntoNotes accordance-n grouping sense 1, NomBank frame file, no relevant PB verb entry, no mapping to VN. Comparison to verb-agree.01. (from accordance.02-n)

example.name: Likely most typical usage
example.text: This product must be disposed of in accordance with federal regulation.

example.name: Args 0 & 2
example.text: One can see, that satisfactory accordance of calculation results with experiments is observed.

example.name: All arguments, invented example
example.text: Mary's accordance with John on the subject of finance was quite surprising to all.

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: Our focus on sub-mentoring derives from our accordance to learning through teaching.
